## HandAlignment enum

How cards in a hand are positioned when there is free space.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare enum HandAlignment 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  Center | <code>1</code> | Center the cards in the hand. |
|  Left | <code>0</code> | Align to the left edge of the hand. |
|  Right | <code>2</code> | Align to the right edge of the hand. |
